00062 template<typename UIntType, size_t w, size_t k, size_t q, size_t s>
00063   class linear_feedback_shift_engine
00064 {
00065   public:
00066     // types
00067 
00071     typedef UIntType result_type;
00072 
00073     // engine characteristics
00074 
00077     static const size_t word_size = w;
00078 
00081     static const size_t exponent1 = k;
00082 
00085     static const size_t exponent2 = q;
00086 
00089     static const size_t step_size = s;
00090 
00093   private:
00094     static const result_type wordmask =
00095       detail::linear_feedback_shift_engine_wordmask<
00096         result_type,
00097         w
00098       >::value;
00102   public:
00103 
00106     static const result_type min = 0;
00107 
00110     static const result_type max = wordmask;
00111 
00114     static const result_type default_seed = 341u;
00115

00117
